title: Diamond and Gemstone Vaddanam - The 'Indra' Collection
materials: Crafted with 13.70 carats of dazzling diamonds

set in high-purity gold. Features a central arrangement of captivating emeralds totaling 7.07 carats and a delicate line of pink carved gemstones totaling 40.55 carats with a single ruby of 1.90 carats. Boasts a radiant Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This stunning Vaddanam features a detailed, floral-inspired design meticulously crafted with a brilliant pave setting to maximize diamond sparkle. The central focal point incorporates a classic flower motif with emeralds, reminiscent of traditional temple jewelry (గుడి ఆభరణాలు). The cascading pink carvings add a touch of modern elegance. Features a secure and adjustable clasp for comfortable wear.
colors: with vibrant green (emeralds) and delicate pink (carved gemstones) accents
all set against the warm glow of gold.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (పెళ్లి)
and special cultural events. Also suitable for adding a touch of regal elegance to modern Indian attire for upscale parties or celebrations.
description: A true heirloom piece, this Vaddanam represents a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The exquisite craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure both lasting beauty and value. A statement piece that embodies prosperity, beauty, and cultural heritage.
